text: "Soul Kitchen" is a 1967 song by The Doors. It is the second track from their debut studio album The Doors. Lead singer Jim Morrison plays tribute to the soul food restaurant Olivia's at Venice Beach, California. It was included on their 1970 live album Absolutely Live. ==References== Category:1967 songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Psychedelic rock songs Category:The Doors songs
title: Soul Kitchen (song)
